title: Bag of Monstrosities
description:
Life’s stories are like a pumpkin pail of candy filled with unexpected tricks, treats and monstrosities. You never know what you’ll pull out of it. In every turn a new surprise tale waits to be unwrapped. It may be something sweet or as sharp as a razorblade. You may get cut, you may be cursed or worse pulling from your bag of monstrosities. First, just one bite of stolen candy has horrific consequences. And then, a creepy sibling rivalry goes too far. Followed by, the ringing phone you must not answer. And finally, we bring you part two of “Jeff the Killer”, our abridged retelling of the anonymous creepy pasta.


When your teamwork is effective - nothing can stop you. To start your free 14-day trial, go to monday.com


Download Best Fiends FREE today on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends!

Become a member today by going to Feals.com/SCARY and you'll get 50% off your first order with free shipping
